channel.title: dang on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in dang on Barefoot Rob

item.title: made a dental appointment
item.description: 21:28 Wednesday 13 February 2019 JST I finally made a dental appointment (with the dentist right under JB’s office) after over a year of not going. It’s for April 10th; there was no availability that lined up with mine. I will probably go to a dentist near our house sometime in Feb or March.

item.title: mt3 site is effed up
item.description:
15:38 Monday 15 October 2018 JST Dang marbletrack3.com is broken now. Netlify created the SSL cert and neither of my browsers like it. I will switch back to hosting on Dreamhost if Netlify cannot sort it out.
I have created a support ticket with Netlify. And to think I was about ready to shift all my static sites over.

item.title: hey, ya wanna make a quick 800 bucks?
item.description: 12:11 Wednesday 08 November 2017 JST Rohini just called to see if I am available all day Friday and Saturday… Oh my goodness I almost am!! All day cycling on Kyushu sounds lovely, especially given that we would be paid for our time! Virtual I-group meeting is tomorrow and I choose not to cancel it given that I am the organizer.

item.title: AB local site dev is broked
item.description: ##09:54 Saturday 20 December 2014 JST## Actually this happened yesterday; actually I don’t know when it happened but I first noticed yesterday. The local installation of AB site isn’t responding. git says nothing has changed, but … something has changed!
